trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_1<tab>Ho there! I know an adventurer after an elite mark when I see one!
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_A1_000_2<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Bloody Mary)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_A1_000_3<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Hellsclaw)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_A1_000_4<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (The Garlok)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_10<tab>Many wonder that. Why, I could have been anything! But a hunter I am, and a keeper of peace. Not so bad in the scheme of things.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_11<tab>Hunting elite marks makes for a comfortable life, I'll warrant, if you're any good─as I am! The bounty is paid in Allied Seals, a harder currency than most in these unsettled times.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_12<tab>Now, a young thing like yourself would need someone older and wiser to show you the ropes! Which elite mark do you fancy, <var 08 E905 ((my lady fair and fierce)) ((my strapping and well<var 1F /var>formed friend)) /var>?

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_13<tab>By the by, never let dreams of wealth and glory blind you to the danger. Know your ranks: B is the least, S is the most, and a merry chase a rank S mark would lead, too.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_20<tab>“Bloody Mary is oft cited as the example of an unstoppable force─Qiqirn gluttony─meeting an immovable object─maternal love. Such characterization would not pass muster beyond the confines of a winesink, however, and is known to provoke dissent even in those establishments.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_21<tab>“While Bloody Mary is indeed an apkallu whose eggs suffered Qiqirn predation, nesting hens as a rule do not spear a failed egg thief a score and a half times with their beaks, then proceed to bathe in their victim's blood.”

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_30<tab>“Hellsclaw. So erratic yet bloody a swath has this piece of magitek cut across the region that it is suspected of being sadly afflicted in some way.”

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_31<tab>So much for the infallibility of Garlean technology, eh? Hard to be afraid of a wheel that needs truing, I know, but be careful all the same.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_40<tab>“A monster long said to dwell in the eternal twilight of a cavern, the Garlok was but an idle tale for generations of Bloodshore's children.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_41<tab>“However, one child was ill content to be idle, and his name was Gegeruju, the Master of Costa del Sol. At his command, a party entered the cavern in search of the Garlok...”

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF3_00185_MOBHUNTERS1F3_000_42<tab>Well, you get the idea. They found the beast slumbering sheltered from the rain, and they woke the damn thing up. Suffice to say it's more than a mite annoyed at being roused so rudely.
